item.description:
OPA!! *****This is a multi-group meetup*****



It's the 30th anniversary of the Saint Barbara Greek Orthodox Church Odyssey Greek festival.

Lots of Greek food, dancing, an Agora (Greek market), Greek cooking demonstrations etc.

There is open dancing for the public.....including beginners!!! Very easy to pick up most of the dance steps. They also have a senior dance troupe that perform in traditional Greek costumes several times a day.

*There is plenty of FREE parking (more to spend on great food LOL)

Festival is mostly outdoors. Sadly, rain will cancel event

Below is the schedule of events for Saturday afternoon:

C 3:30 p.m. Saint Barbara Choir Performance
FP 4:00 p.m. Greek Cooking Demonstration

E 4:30 p.m. ODYSSEY Dancers
E 6:00-10:00 p.m. Live Greek Music by "The Hellenic Company" (open dancing)

C 7:00 p.m. Presentation: Greek Orthodoxy
E 8:00 p.m. ODYSSEY Dancers
E 9:30 p.m. Special Alumni Dance Troup

Saint Barbara Greek Orthodox Chrurch
480 Racebrook Road
Orange, CT 06477
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the top of the driveway near the church. If late, call my cell 203-668-0175 so you can meet us inside.

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Odyssey Greek Festival
